title: Liar's Poker - Michael Lewis [Qwerty80]
description:

Michael Lewis was fresh out of Princeton and the London School of Economics when he landed a job at Salomon Brothers, one of Wall StreetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s premier investment firms. During the next three years, Lewis rose from callow trainee to bond salesman, raking in millions for the firm and cashing in on a modern-day gold rush. LiarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Poker is the culmination of those heady, frenzied yearsÃ¢â‚¬â€a behind-the-scenes look at a unique and turbulent time in American business.
